data.name: The Corpse Crusade
data.detailed_description:
Game still under development. In-development screenshots on store page are are subject to change.

Dark fantasy 2D pixelart hack-and-slash adventure.
Explore a medieval world full of bizarre demons and even more fearsome zealots.
Experience a story full of twists and turns.
Fight a large cast of heretics, monsters, demons, and sinister forces.
Use Purifier Knight equipment and superhuman abilities to defeat over 30 boss fights.
Lead a troop of Santifrancan crusaders in a fight against heretics & demons while unraveling a sinister conspiracy.

Saint Marcus has been executed during a pilgrimage to Calvonia. The conflict over his holy remains leads to declaration of a crusade. War veteran Simon Vicario rejoins the fight with nothing left to lose only to end up having to re-examine his values and beliefs while protecting those he loves.

Game fully developed by a single developer. Currently planned release price will be around 3-5€ with some free DLC. Release date might possibly change earlier.

data.short_description: Dark fantasy pixelart hack-and-slash adventure set in a world full of bizarre demons and even more fearsome zealots. Lead a troop of Santifrancan crusaders in a fight against heretics & demons while unraveling a sinister conspiracy.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3550H
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Vega Mobile Gfx 2.10 GHz
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3550H
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Vega Mobile Gfx 2.10 GHz
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Contains gore and almost comically excessive blood spilling
